snippet.title: After Midnight - launch trailer
snippet.description:
After Midnight – a game that mixes turn-based strategy and puzzle gameplay – is now available on PC and Mac!
http://afterburn.games/am - download now for free!
Editing by Paweł Piskorski, music by Jan Łoziński

Build your medical dream team consisting of a young doctor, an experienced nurse, and a silent-yet-effective paramedic, and get ready to face deadly viruses and bacteria that have taken over the hospital where you work.

The game's development was partially funded thanks to the National Centre for Culture Poland's "Kultura w Sieci" programme. For more information, please visit https://www.nck.pl/dotacje-i-stypendia/dotacje/programy-dotacyjne-nck/kultura-w-sieci
